title: Hi, Im Just Wondering If My Phrases Are Toxic Or Not
body:
Just wondering if phrases like, "Sit the Fuck DOWN!", "You're dog" "dog" "better Jungler Wins" and " I'm Just Better!" are phrases that could potentially lower my honor and get me banned? 
         I typically type all of these into all chat as "banter". They just get me hyped to play this amazing game!
Also if you could pull up my logs and point out what bad words I might be potentially banned or punished for that would be fantasitc :D

                           Thanks WeenieWarrior <3

replies.body:
Let's not bump old threads as doing so is necromancy which violates the [**Board Universal Rules**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/ITFIpNUE).  I'm going to lock this thread down now.

If anyone has questions about this lock, feel free to reach out to the Moderation Team via:

* The [**NA Boards Discord**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification)
* The [**Discuss the Boards**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) sub-board

{{sticker:poppy-wink}}
You don't type these as a banter and you know it and I wish to never have you in my games if you use them, because they show a completely rotten character. Also you're probably 12.
Yes, yes they can give you a chat restriction.
Toxicity is a bit subjective. Those are objectively punishable phrases though.
At least you are honest with me :)

I don't think those will get you banned, but if you drop "fuck", you'll probably be fine. It is a dictionary-type ban bot, and it will recognize "better jg wins" and "dog" if you use the same phrases over and over. Mix it up a little and don't do it repeatedly in a single game and you'll be 100% fine.

I can't encourage that you demean the enemy, but stuff like "I'm just better!" isn't a sign of rotten character. Restrain yourself properly and you'll show who's really mentally 12 years old (Not you.)
